A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The worst Starwars movie ever made. Not only is it pointless but it undoes and spits on anything that the original trilogy and characters stood for. It destroys Luke Skywalker and everything he stood and fought for. It's a malicious movie which disrespects the joy\, adventure and fun of any of the previous movies (especially the OT). This is the only Starwars movie that I walked out of hating it.
